comment._content: Her husband's wikipedia entry: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Bakhmeteff She was an American, Mary Beale; her father's wikipedia entry: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edward_Fitzgerald_Beale Her nephew Ned McLean married Evalyn Walsh, who turned up in last week's LOC uploads: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/8056646947/]

comment._content: pennylrichardsca:  Thank you for filling in the details about Mrs. George Bakhmeteff. We will add more details when we update.
